title: Learning Ruby On Rails Training Video
description:
Learning Ruby On Rails Training Video
A Practical Ruby Training Course That Teaches Real World Skills

In this project-based Learning Ruby On Rails video tutorial series, you'll quickly have relevant skills for real-world applications.

Follow along with our expert instructor in this training course to get:

    Concise, informative and broadcast-quality Learning Ruby On Rails training videos delivered to your desktop
    The ability to learn at your own pace with our intuitive, easy-to-use interface
    A quick grasp of even the most complex Learning Ruby On Rails subjects because they're broken into simple, easy to follow tutorial videos

Practical working files further enhance the learning process and provide a degree of retention that is unmatched by any other form of Learning Ruby On Rails tutorial, online or offline... so you'll know the exact steps for your own projects.
More Sharing ServicesShare | Share on facebook Share on twitter Share on email
SKU: 01902 | Duration: 8.25 hours - 100 tutorial videos | Date Released: 2014-02-12
Works on: Windows PC or Mac | Format: DVD and Download | Instructor: Brian Hoke Google +
